test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values
for col in numerical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median(), inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].median(), inplace=True)

for col in categorical_columns:
    if X_train[col].isnull().any():
        mode_val = X_train[col].mode()[0] if not X_train[col].mode().empty else 'Unknown'
        X_train[col].fillna(mode_val, inplace=True)
        X_test[col].fillna(mode_val, inplace=True)

# Feature engineering
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_train['TotalSF'] = X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['GrLivArea']
X_train['TotalBsmtSF'] = X_train['TotalBsmtSF'].fillna(0)
X_train['BsmtFinSF1'] = X_train['BsmtFinSF1'].fillna(0)
X_train['BsmtFinSF2'] = X_train['BsmtFinSF2'].fillna(0)
X_train['GarageArea'] = X_train['GarageArea'].fillna(0)

X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']
X_test['RemodAge'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['TotalSF'] = X_test['1stFlrSF'] + X_test['2ndFlrSF'] + X_test['GrLivArea']
X_test['TotalBsmtSF'] = X_test['TotalBsmtSF'].fillna(0)
X_test['BsmtFinSF1'] = X_test['BsmtFinSF1'].fillna(0)
X_test['BsmtFinSF2'] = X_test['BsmtFinSF2'].fillna(0)
X_test['GarageArea']
